Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1980...
Injured on 4/12/1982 with a Bruised Heel, out for 3 days...
Injured on 5/1/1982 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 4/27/1983 with a Sore Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1986, off Roger Clemens (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1986, off Lee Guetterman (CHC)...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1986...
Injured on 4/24/1987 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 5/19/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1989, hitting .385 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1989, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1990...
Injured on 8/29/1991 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1991...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Atlanta on 6/29/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1992, hitting .423 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 10/2/1994 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for entire career...
